text:
Lacres is a commune. It is found in the region Nord-Pas-de-Calais in the Pas-de-Calais department in the north of France. Lacres is about 12 miles or 19 kilometers south east of Boulogne, where the D901 meets with the D125 and D125e roads.
Some places to visit there are the church of St. Martin, from the 1400's and a farm and manor house from the 1600's.
